casename: The Law Society of Singapore v Disciplinary Committee
counsel: Peter Cuthbert Low and Christine Sekhon (Peter Low, Tang & Belinda Ang) for the applicant; Harry Elias SC and Yeo Yen Ping (Harry Elias Partnership) for Kwa Kim Li; Michael Khoo SC and Josephine Low (Michael Khoo & Partners) for Vivien Quahe Mei Lin
tags-parsed: Legal Profession/Professional conduct/Grossly improper conduct/Practice Directions para 2.3/Property developer inviting solicitors to be on panel of solicitors/Property developer devising scheme offering financial advantage to buyers if solicitors on panel used/Whether solicitors agreed to, and participated in, the scheme/Whether solicitors guilty of improper conduct or practice as advocate and solicitor/Whether solicitors guilty of misconduct unbefitting advocate and solicitor/ss 5(c) & 83(2)(b) Legal Profession Act (Cap 161, 1994 Ed)
